channel.title: Laver Cup on Stats On the T
channel.description: Recent content in Laver Cup on Stats On the T

item.title: Europe Readies to Defend Laver Cup Title
item.description: Following it’s successful debut in 2017, the Laver Cup will makes its second edition this week. Defending champions Team Europe will meet Team World in Chicago, with new teammates joining each side. In this post, I look at how competitive the 2018 instalment of Laver Cup is shaping up to be.
